title.en: "Ittemo yo ka yo?" Jun'ai Tiger wa Jikkuri Amaku Seme Ageru

altTitles.zh-hk: 高潮也可以哦？純愛之虎漸漸用甜蜜將你攻陷

altTitles.zh: 高潮也可以哦？纯爱之虎渐渐用甜蜜将你攻陷

altTitles.ja: 「イッてもよかよ？」純愛タイガーはじっくり甘く攻めあげる

altTitles.en: "Wanna cum?" The Pure Taiga Advances Slow and Sweet

altTitles.ja-ro: `Itte Mo Yo Ka Yo?' Jun'ai Taigā wa Jikkuri Amaku Seme Ageru

altTitles.en: “Go Ahead and Come” ~The Tiger Inches Closer With His Pure Love, Sweetly but Surely~

description.en: "I'll overwrite all the men you've been with until now." Not just my heart, but inside, slowly filling me to the brim...?! Although he'll be leaving three months after she fell for him... Their love becomes a habit. Kotori, who has been searching for love has only been betrayed by men until now. The one who had true feelings for her was the a part-timer at a bar, Taiga. The shop's regulars joke about how well-matched of a couple they are, but does Kotori-san have any reason not to fall in love with him...? "If you're lonely, I'll stay by your side." She stands no chance! A younger man who is skilled at love and conveys his feelings properly... Not falling in love is impossible.
description.ja: 「今までの男、全部上書きして消しちゃる」おっきいのが挿入っちゃダメなとこまでっ！心だけじゃなく、ナカまでじっくりたっぷりマーキングされて…!?好きになってもあと3ヶ月後に彼は…。わかってるのに、この溺愛が癖になる――。 本気の恋を探す琴鈴(ことり)は、出会う男性に裏切られてばかり。そんな琴鈴をいつも気にかけてくれるのは、行きつけの居酒屋のバイトくん・虎優(たいが)。お店の常連さんからもお似合いカップルと茶化されているけど、琴鈴には虎優を好きになってはいけない理由があって…？ 「寂しかなら俺が一緒におるけん」優しく抱きしめられたと思ったら…ズルいっ！エッチも上手で、まっすぐ愛を伝えてくれる年下くんなんて……好きになっちゃうに決まってる。
